channel.title: Restoring an old save file in Half Life 2?
channel.description:
Just wondering if it's possible to restore a save file not listed in Half Life 2 Episode 2's 'load game' list.
I've looked in Steam/Steamapps/username/half life 2 episode two/ep2/SAVE and none of the SAV files there are old enough to be what I need.
Figured I'd ask just in case I missed something though.
And I'm aware I can start the game on whatever chapter I'd like, but I'd still prefer to find a save where I don't screw up the gnome launch. Heh

item.title: Restoring an old save file in Half Life 2?
item.dc:creator: K_amp_955_ON
item.description:
Ah, what I figured. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Restoring an old save file in Half Life 2?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
It’s gone, son.

Start that shit again.

item.title: Restoring an old save file in Half Life 2?
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
“Map lastchaptermapname” then finish the credit then you can select from the chapter that you want.

No, you can’t restoring old save file that was made before the Half-life 2 update.

Read full topic
